org.apache.xerces.xni.psvi
Interface ElementPSVI

All Superinterfaces:
ItemPSVI
public interface ElementPSVI
extends ItemPSVI

Represent a PSVI item for one element information item. The interface may be updated or replaced.

Version:
$Id: ElementPSVI.java,v 1.7 2003/02/20 23:10:44 elena Exp $
Author:
Elena Litani, IBM
